public java.lang.String queryRoster(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,

      • reload

        @RequestMapping(value="reloads")
public java.lang.String reload(@RequestParam(value="name",required=false,defaultValue="")
                                                                 java.lang.String name,
                                                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                 org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        教师重新选择班级，重新加载名册
        参数:
        name - 班级名称
        另请参阅:
        RosterService.judgeReload(HttpServletRequest, Model, String)

        @RequestMapping(value="ajax")
 @ResponseBody
public void saveCall(@RequestParam
                                                                    java.lang.String[] str,
                                                                    @RequestParam(value="id",required=false,defaultValue="")
                                                                    java.lang.String id,
                                                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)

        id - 备注

        @RequestMapping(value="removehis")
 @ResponseBody
public void removeHis(@RequestParam(value="stuid")
                                                                          java.lang.String stuid,
                                                                          @RequestParam(value="calldate")
                                                                          java.lang.String calldate)
